title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast
Tuesday: Arena Series with Crim
Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Is Elfball A Meme Now?
videos.description:
Elves were once feared in what feels like a millennia ago. But Tarkir Dragonstorm brought us Craterhoof Behemoth. For the most part, we've got a good chunk of the pieces to assemble the elfball, let's see if it's still playable!

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/single-scoop-is-elfball-a-meme-now
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7056996#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/QTEiH
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/Vw70b

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: I Play My Entire Deck on Turn 3 with The Sibsig Ceremony  Against the Odds
videos.description:
What are the odds of going infinite-ish with The Sibsib Ceremony in Standard and using it to play our entire deck (as 2/2 Zombie Druids) in one turn? Let's find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/against-the-odds-the-sibsig-ceremony-combo-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7038541#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/AhlnY
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/0CO2o

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Elspeth Makes Mono White Absurd
videos.description:
Elspeth, Storm Slayer is going to slay more than storms as she seems like she could be one of the powerful closers for Mono White Tokens!

Today's video is bought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/single-scoop-elspeth-makes-mono-white-absurd

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Only Fools Believe in a Mana Curve; I Believe in Breaching Dragonstorm  Meme or Dream?
videos.description:
Is a Breaching Dragonstorm deck with a curve that starts at mana value 5 a meme or a dream in our current aggressive Standard format? Let's find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/meme-or-dream-only-fools-believe-in-a-mana-curve-i-believe-in-breaching-dragonstorm
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7041640#paper
